name: Grimfire
description:
This is an early phase of my new fps than started development 1 month ago , after much  hard work I have brought this prototype build out for you guys to have a play around with, this is in a very early phase.

that is where you the community come in... I need you to help me, a solo developer, to figure out what you want this game to be and how you want it to turn out, I intend for this game to be completely driven by the community as long as you are all willing to stick along for this long and daunting development journey.
